item.title: 特朗普说，他将在周一与Zelensky的普京谈论乌克兰战争 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: 特朗普说，他将在周一与Zelensky的普京谈论乌克兰战争＆nbsp; nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmifkfvx3lxte9izmkxmxmxhpdevurkxlm29od1fht0p2vu1duvlmvi1ivlmvi1ivlldlldlldlldlldlldlld of UkxvUVZXZmxQaVkwVDZUU0JBc1pKT19mNDMtVXQteTVkRTFGQ25HYldiVVhuTEFpU3hGeVM4ZlN0aWZXdnFMWkNLSW1FMWNOS3pWLTVkdw?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>特朗普和普京说，他们将在周一讨论乌克兰和平提案＆nbsp; nbsp; 《纽约时报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwwfbvvv95cuxqmw9budlxvmjpdf9kc05k ek1cww1zdlotu1bnnhfhexjnsknoeedaotfozlpztc1banhvzhrhahrhahvnqi1ovhe5yzbpendvbwvrwrwtn ky3vmy2M5Y2Q1VWFWX2VJA0ZUBNFLOVCZEVFDYLPMMMPZMJR4VMXVMXVTGJTMFQWVMD2UENNGN5Q2LTMF Z0DU4YC0JRVTDCSKRUZ29IELNGD1PZQMC2UFYXBTDZMGLZRNATCTFZYVMTDNJKEK5TCLJOTLE？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>特朗普在土耳其进行了会谈后，周一与俄罗斯，乌克兰领导人交谈href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmitafbvv95cuxpuzher2tvovjludfockpxbkhutd-0vxnrafjrv0lv0lwekxjwekxjwhz4um9nm9nm29vsdzer0r0yy1flnfrqunfrqunfrquunzkekekekekekew. ctwdjmrgxialpinu8zykgwqxl2cghbmhnxcjf4qkjfutvuntnzovv​​untnzovv​​utn0i4ekz5eufuohffbhhh3tnpbuwhiekke2npbuwhcke2npekke2npekke2nnpbuwhcke2n nnybefls2ntqkkkek50vhcxktkxtkxtkxtkxtkxtkxtkxtkxtccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccw.nnybetzn0hxt.nnybtsnetxtndnblextnettnblext ZcDRsUW5JbEh0SVjSAboBQVVfeXFMTmVIakZSbUtlc2JfVnN1ejBnVW5iSHpDVjBDTTVrSEtSZGxoWExpTWJXc3NwX3lNTVR6ak9Id1hNeTNFaFZZM1hocWJqcEN2U2psT09UNnhu aEZ3dGY5STdqSlZtMWxQTTdrMC01SFNZb3cxYUs1cjlVVUNyRTVBRlFKYXBWX3E2Vm5jbkkyLURERGIzbGxvenNJdVRpWmdsaFpxLUVEcVQ2UDU3LWF5Vk9hRDRNRUgtV0pn?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>特朗普说，他将打电话给普京，Zelenskyy讨论乌克兰'Bloodbath'＆nbsp; nbsp; al Jazeera href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxOd1YyY2dPVVlyYjZVUzlLbmNPa243Z2VrNHg1alFsWHdKUVU4TDV2c3Q1ZHNsQzVqcTI1UXFGS3Q5a2Z 3Qly0MZV4ANRHQVNGQLZZCNBLWUPGMTDZNTBWRDJEDXC2DZBWZTVPQ213S3ZQEMFVZMHD rlyyeuz2nnm5ck4wmejqccdlpre9sctf1q1v0wlpodzhkrmtpbzdpbzduvk1uytm4uuxb？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>在普京在土耳其举行的会谈中是一场著作，特朗普说，他很快就会与俄罗斯领导人见面＆nbsp; nbsp; ap ap news> ap news

item.title: 以色列在加沙发起了新的军事行动。内塔尼亚胡（Netanyahu）告诉谈判团队保持谈判-KTLA
item.description: 以色列在加沙发起了新的军事行动。内塔尼亚胡（Netanyahu href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimwfbvv95cuxpd2fmtxbyyunsbjmtm3jm3jm3jvllkzkdtujjc3rvbjc3rvbjc3rvbjc3rvbjcoupiyxlrsmfrsmf1zgpqcccccccfdqaejaejejzejzcaejzccc. VNLVWFBeVkybklKSjVLX1VWWFgyMmRoMU9CZEtJUy1tRzM2aTg4MVZmdmZ0MTNmTHJFX3NEWFd1T0NkUUF3YXFsZ2NBVEZKM0x4SUt6cG52dFlVMERfQlRWc  mhtte5kv0owswe1dedibfprsepjcv9xewdkamfmme9eb21fsnc2yu1ndvnrmlvetu96c25jq0iys0iys0iys0d5agptdxlxlxng1ng1udgljay1toxvppwkjsy0rhwxnf？ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列在加沙发起重大的新进攻，因为联合国称巴勒斯坦人的情况为“超越人类” ＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列动员加沙的新地面攻击向哈马斯施加压力释放人质＆nbsp; pbs 更新：以色列杀死70 ＆nbsp; al Jazeera 以色列的加沙枪声说它的部队正在动员＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报

item.title: 乌克兰说，俄罗斯对苏米地区公共汽车的袭击杀死了九人
item.description: 俄罗斯对苏米地区公共汽车的袭击杀死了九人，与和平谈话后数小时href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxtfaxsjliv2jwvnnznup2s0hxaxq2vuth SFP1V0E4ZHP6NKTQA0CXQWFVSDNHWMVNEFDPQU93S3NSQ3KTWGT1AENEWJLWJLWEFHLTFPQAGJOGJOGJOUM93CLCCLCLEN9XZZW？OC = 5英寸target =“ _ blank”>据报道，九个据报道在乌克兰的俄罗斯民用巴士罢工中被杀href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilgfbvv95cuxong9ccmhka2lut1vea1u2bjnpbgnaewoteus4vepsynrdrdpsynrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrdrrdrdrdrdrdrdrrdrdrdrdrdrdzy3vhavha vha0jzckcklqnxzon XFNd1NUMk1Td0lFY2xmRkFCcXZNeFE5c09tVERSbm1od0Vma2JkX0VDU0ZTWE5ER1hYaklrd0l3ZjNFMHBrQlpaVFBwdjBPd0ViaUtSMW5fUlg5ZU10Ym1NR2c?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>乌克兰更新：特朗普下周致电Zelenskyy ＆nbsp; nbsp; dw 乌克兰，欧洲敦促无人机杀死九个＆nbsp; REUTERS <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxQWkNGbXBncjlORjVUNVd2aFEwak9YbktrdlYyMVotbzRSOXJMZGJTMGZTeGdqR1lrZ0UtNFYtQS1Rc1N0Vlh XTK54CEXEZU1VZ0W5UFDLNUX3CJHQVKPIWVVRYLE5WG1ONNFRBVKYMMZYYWZJUMHIMHIMKDVWE FCQ2ZTBUHETI0YDWRIY1BFUJVMSLFVTXFYOURMDHO0EUVMC3NIEHK0QWFQZGDTRWS？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> Zelenskyy要求在致命的俄罗斯罢工之后进行更严格的莫斯科制裁＆nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 恐怖分子打扮成妇女将埃丹·亚历山大（Edan Alexander）转移到加沙（Gaza），发表人质叙述 - 耶路撒冷邮报

item.title: 阿拉伯联盟峰会的领导人推动加沙停火，承诺重建资金 - 以色列时报
item.description: 阿拉伯领导人有望在加沙重建中进行重建，然后按停火＆nbsp; nbsp; ap ap news 阿拉伯联盟呼吁在巴格达的峰会上重建加沙的资金 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMivAFBVV95cUxNMllYRWh0QWZha2VMVFFLM0RodGhWOTVuMy04cTFXVnJNTDJ6UFVjaGpFaXJMZHU4VEg1VFNtNFdJT2VzODlqN1diZFBneU I1BHNJSWXUB0PGWI1FRHVYQ04TQ3R0ZZBNBG1TWNZQS1PFQMRVMRVM1FHA2XKNDH2SGNDH2SGNVWXBXUJFWTDC 2M1BYAWPMNVNTSG9BSXHFC1QTCLVISEVNWU00BERTMUF5ATRXZ0LU1FVE5EWETOQZB5OA？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>阿拉伯领导人坚强以色列的谴责，因为它加剧了加沙轰炸＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxNdHRqZWNxSUVNNDhpUEJsUzJaU2RXTldTMWFLaEdSS3dPdEV0MTB5MTFZclZIVS13RWNqWUFBUnJvSi1MTEs xMy1IXzRIQWFtVEx6YVd0SnJxWFIzbTF1Rm5TbF8xSFlrMHpqbUFEUmJNLTBMZm9id2d6YU9qTFFQVmZoWUpzZGtOd0toYVBiTUJmT1FIQWF2MUVOVGlPQ0pERE1BT0pER1lDLXc?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”> PA的Abbas呼吁哈马斯放弃加沙规则，放弃武器＆nbsp; 以色列时代

item.title: 大师的谈判者“用言语淹死了魔鬼”：伊朗的核男人与我们交谈-Ynetnews

item.title: 美国政府各地的官员争先恐后地执行特朗普的惊喜宣布-CNN
item.description: 美国政府各地的官员争先恐后地实施特朗普的惊喜叙利亚宣布＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 他们在说什么：多亏了特朗普总统＆nbsp； href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiggfbvv95cuxox25zqjvtnkxqtlvhs3jhs3jhsli1wjvozkfgm1llm1llmm52vxnhmuprtlvvwnh VX1JFZMPFX3NPEUJMN0VTV0Q3RTVNAF82ELR5RNKWNTVUB0R3VEZFBKZONUQYRXG1VXRZM3QZETLEBB3QZETLYUTBB3YUGTSKFGQXN1FGQXN1AF83RFNASDRQS3V3？ target =“ _ blank”>卢比奥在最新一步中遇到叙利亚人遇到正常化关系＆nbsp; nbsp; axios 特朗普与叙利亚的新领导人的会面是一个饱受战争war的国家的转折点＆nbsp; nbsp; pbs 特朗普承诺对叙利亚制裁的承诺对美国意味着＆nbsp; nbsp; MSNBC News

item.title: 普京的和平剧院不断观看特朗普和基辅等待 - 金融时报
item.description: 普京的和平剧院不断观看特朗普 - 基辅等待＆nbsp;＆nbsp; Financial Times 一个鞭打的外交周将乌克兰几乎留在了＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn The chilling moment in Russia-Ukraine peace talks - as Putin makes mockery of Trump's efforts to end war Sky News随着政治剧院在土耳其的中心舞台，战争在乌克兰进行。 Kyiv几乎没有选项＆nbsp;＆nbsp; ap news 在伊斯坦布尔，俄罗斯，西方陷入了象棋，而西方则陷入了信心＆nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f“

item.title: IDF磅在也门的Houthi港口，威胁要在导弹袭击后杀死领导人 - 以色列时代
item.description: idf磅在也门的胡塞港口，威胁要杀死领导者，在导弹后，无人机攻击＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时代href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmipafbvv95cuxpm3jkqniwc3l2rdcxqthqthrqthrqthrqthrqthqlutvjddukzsamflq1vzqzqzqzqzqzqzqzqzqzqzqzqzogde3ugc1ltatrly5qjjy 1c2FmOEZHVXRDemRHRlc4bHZldkhFS2FSV05ReFQ0ZEdJc2c5QzdnSWZKS2I5em5zWlNsOFUyNkQ4cFZ6eUxpRXdBOXpia3lZRkgwNGx5LUtHc0VsTEdrU2pZcmxZLU NGLTZxeDBoM1R4R9IBqgFBVV95cUxObXVUdXV4ckZmUlAwYnlsZEk0VlROY2ZSQ1V2UEJtbWdWNnpuLXRJTEhQQmRFdTZzSXlHRmxfT2VLVTFwYlpGVVhoOGZXVXZjb mxxdDdzUi10R1BkQVpJc0F6cTZzQk1ZbzhGV3VhN3hkSEVTcmw5N1dqdzI0TVFpUEV0T2lPaGV1eWhOeWJQSG90aldDLXR2NnllV0puVHFzSUZfYUMtWUNrQQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>以色列在两个也门端口上发动罢工＆nbsp;＆nbsp; al Jazeera IDF确认也门空袭，说它破坏了Houthi控制的端口的基础设施 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmixefvx3lxte1qddnucfd1x2ndwudrrrradaymla3swpne ktavi1wrzjpszbqqkhyn2gzu1f2q0zqznvvqwqwqw9fshf6svftdcjjwev5smrys05trmjuykj5z5z5z09gswzxagg1？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>观看：卡兹威胁要暗杀胡塞领导人，同时暗示穆罕默德·辛瓦（Mohammed Sinwar）的死 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijgjbvv95cuxpcmlrrawluxzbru1ittc1xotlboup0nmfnyvdnyvdqbtz6mjdiu JB5ZS1COXZ0CXNBVFYZDTRXWU5LTMC4CZVWQWXRCEP4B2W2W2EVJLUU1BCK02OES2OENHBXF3M2SZUM9QNTY5Z05Z0JMMLIWOGS2CKTVOWOWOWY0C JFZQJAZMC1FEKG3N19ZDGTRQ1RKLXJNBEHUOGPWWE9TLVZWVMFKMHHTTKZZTGZZTGNXVDHHYCGY4ZKEWWU5QTKJQTKJQCE9ZENPECXENPECXLMCNDYLVBOS 1JXDKZACXMYAV96NWDKVZQ5AKHJNM9VAHHHPFFOY1H3SKRZQKLCCEL2NKX4KX4VUSXVLDMDVMDVMDVMDVMTVMTVMTVMTVMTK2HONGK2HONGK2HONGK2AMQYZZG3OGCYX3C？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>以色列中部特拉维夫的火箭警报器； IDF识别从也门发射的导弹＆nbsp; haaretz
